dialog: Yes, they returned it and it was in perfect shape. I was so grateful.
That's great! I'm glad you were able to get it back in good shape.
That's great! I'm glad they were able to return it to you. What kind of fishing do you like to do?
I like to go fishing in the ocean. It's so peaceful and relaxing.
That sounds like a lot of fun. I've never been fishing, but I've always wanted to.
It's a great way to spend time with friends and family. You should give it a try!
I think I will. I think it would be nice to get away from the city for a bit.
It really is. It's so peaceful and relaxing. Do you have any hobbies?
I like to play video games. What about you? What do you like to do in your spare time?
Video games are fun, but I'm more of a bookworm. I love to read.
That sounds like it would be really scary. Do you live near a beach? I don't like them.
I do live near the beach, but I'm not a big fan of them either.
What do you do for a living? I want to be an actress someday.
I work at a grocery store as a cashier. It's not the most glamorous job in the world, but it pays the bills.
That sounds like a good job to have. I bet you get to meet a lot of interesting people.
I do, and it's a great way to meet new people and make some extra cash.
I bet it is. I wish I had a job like that. I'm still in school.
I'm sure you'll find something soon. What are you studying in school right now?
I'm studying to be a nurse. What do you want to do when you graduate?
I am not sure yet. I am still trying to figure out what I want to major in.
He does believe in animal rights, but he just doesn't agree with me on a lot of things.
That's unfortunate. Animal rights are very important. I hope he changes his mind.
I hope so too. I don't understand how people can be so cruel to animals.
Some people are just cruel. I'm sorry you have to deal with that. Do you have any pets?
Yes, I have a dog. He's a rescue dog and I love him so much.
That's great! I have two dogs myself. They're the best. What kind of dog do you have?
I have an Australian Cattle Dog, he's the cutest thing in the world.
I've never heard of an Aussie Dog. What is it like to have one?
It's a medium sized dog, I love him so much. He's so friendly and gentle.
That's so cool! I've always wanted a dog, but I live in an apartment so I can't have one. Do you have any other pets?
I agree.  I like mine with chocolate syrup and vanilla ice cream.  How about you?
I like it with cookie dough or cookies and cream. It's so good!
I love it with a strawberry shortcake or chocolate chip cookie shake.
That sounds really good. I'll have to try that sometime. Do you have a favorite ice cream flavor?
I like mint chocolate chip the best.  What is your favorite flavor of ice cream?
I really like cookie dough ice cream. It's so sweet and creamy. What's your favorite?
I really like Ben & Jerry's Cookie Dough.  It is one of the most popular ice cream brands in the world.
I've never heard of that brand. I'll have to look it up. My favorite ice cream is cookies and cream.
It was founded in 1948 by Ben and Jerry.  They have been around a long time.
Yes, I've heard of them. They were founded by two brothers in New York City.
I think it went well.  We had a good time and I think she liked me.
That's great! I hope you two continue to have a great time together. How long have you two been together?
We have been together for a year and a half.  She is the love of my life.
I'm so happy for you! I wish you two the best of luck in the future.
Thank you so much!  I appreciate that.  I hope the same for you as well.
You're welcome! I hope everything works out for you two, and I hope you have a wonderful life together!
Thank you very much.  It's been a long time since we've seen each other.
I know how you feel. I haven't seen my family in a few years. It's nice to see them again.
I'm sorry to hear that.  Do you have any plans to see your family soon?
Yes, we are going to the beach for the first time. I can't wait!
